definition: economic rights (e.g. of a state monopoly)

sentences.english: This letter is to inform you that we have lately obtained a patent for a new type propulsion system for aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 我方的飞机新型推进系统已获专利权，特此函告。

sentences.english: After the application is approved, the entity or individual that applies for it shall be the patentee.
sentences.chinese: 申请被批准后，申请的单位或者个人为专利权人。

sentences.english: The assignment shall take effect as of the date of registration.
sentences.chinese: 专利申请权或者专利权的转让自登记之日起生效。

sentences.english: This letter is to inform you that we have lately obtain a patent for an improved method of aluminum solder.
sentences.chinese: 我们改进的铝焊接法最近获得专利权，特此函告。

sentences.english: The Regulation of Anti-Monopoly Law for the Abuse of Patent Right;
sentences.chinese: 限制专利权滥用制度，是专利法中的重要内容。

sentences.english: The contract binds the company to pay royalties to the inventor.
sentences.chinese: 合同使这家公司必须付给发明者专利权使用费。

sentences.english: ISO shall not be held responsible for identifying any or all such patent rights.
sentences.chinese: ISO无须负责任来识别任何此类专利权。

sentences.english: The patent right for utility model or design shall take effect as of the date of the announcement.
sentences.chinese: 实用新型专利权和外观设计专利权自公告之日起生效。

sentences.english: The patent right for utility model or design shall take effect as of the date of the announcement.
sentences.chinese: 实用新型专利权和外观设计专利权自公告之日起生效。

sentences.english: Samsung has counter-sued, arguing Apple infringed its wireless patents.
sentences.chinese: 三星已反诉讼过，认为苹果公司侵犯其无线专利权。

sentences.english: A generic medicine is an equivalent of an originator pharmaceutical product.
sentences.chinese: 另外文中也提到了关于一些药品的专利权问题。

sentences.english: He patented the idea that the atom could be split.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了“原子可以再分”这一概念的专利权。

sentences.english: We sell patent right and usufruct of RIAF, and provide tech support.
sentences.chinese: 出售专利权，使用权，并提供技术支持。

sentences.english: It's a coincidence that we've also got the patent.
sentences.chinese: 我们也拥有这项专利权纯系巧合。

sentences.english: After the application is approved, the entity shall be the patentee.
sentences.chinese: 申请被批准后，该单位为专利权人。

sentences.english: Since the very beginning, Chinese Telecommunication Qingji was under the control of foreign companies.
sentences.chinese: 中国电信利权自清季电信业创办以来迭遭外人侵夺。

definition: having trading relations (of nations or regions)
a form of transit taxation in China introduced to finance armies to suppress the Taiping Rebellion
the Qing court (as government of China)
Westerner employed in Qing China (as professor or military advisor etc)
the country weakened and the people empoverished (idiom)
the Qing dynasty equivalent of the Foreign Office
